description: Creates a graph structure from a datatable containing edge data.

input.name: from
input.description: The name of the column containing the origin node of the edge.

input.name: to
input.description: The name of the column containing the destination node of the edge.

input.name: direction
input.description:
Specifies whether the graph is directed or not.
If unspecified, defaults to "none".

output.name: graph
output.description: A graph structure defining nodes and edges.
